141.content:
Jade knew that her stomach had grown lately but she had to admit that she liked liked it. She liked how it was soft and a bit jiggly. She felt like it was very sexy and feminine Her mom and her mom's girlfriend had also liked the growth of her belly and had been encouraging her to gain more weight. She wasn't doing sports anymore which she had grown bored of, loved eating and being lazy, and knew that gaining weight would only make her beautiful and so was starting to serouisly consider gaining weight. Her mom had said that girls were meant to be soft and fat and she had to agree with her.

As the lunch bell rang, Jade gathered up her things and headed of class. She blushed as she heard her stomach grumble hungrily. She hoped that no one heard that. Now that she was seventeen she had a license and a car, and now that she was an upperclassmen, a junor, she could go off campus for lunch. She decided to go McDonalds for lunch. She loved fast food, it was one of her favorite types of food afterall. After stopping at her locker to put alway her books, Jade headed out to the parking lot. She got into her car, put on her seatbelt, started the car, and drove over the McDonalds nearby.

She was pleasantly surprised to find that it was not busy. She found a space near the front, parked, got out, and headed inside the resturant. She ordered the number 2 with supersized fries and a soda. She was feeling pretty hungry and decided that today would be the start of her slowly but surely working to put on weight. She paid for her food, got it, and carried it over to an empty table. She sat down, took off the straw wrapper and stuck the straw into her soda. She then unwrapped her first cheeseburger and took a bite. It was so good that she quickly took another and another until she had eaten it all. She then ate a couple of fries and washed it down with a couple sips of her soda. She then started on her second cheeseburger which she had eaten even faster then the first one. It was like the first cheeseburger had only wet her appetite and made her even hungrier.

When Jade finished her second burger, she began to concentrate on her fries and the soda. She began stuffing handful after handful of fries down her throat, washing them down with sips of her soda. She did this fast at first but slowed down as she grew fuller. At one point, she was getting so full that she didn't think that she would be able to eat it all, she perserved and was able to. She then laid back in her seat, getting patting before beginning to getnly rubbed her bloated belly. She moaned a soft contened sigh. She had never felt this full and despite it being a little painful, she was finding it quite pleasureable.
141.title: lunch

152.content:
Jamie was on the couch watching T. V munching on some chips. Outside it was snowing but inside it was nice and warm with a big fire burning in the fire place.

"Mom i have a date!" Marissa yelled against Brooke. "I'm going to the movie!"

"Then ask you little sister if she likes coming with you."

"Come on we're not even real sisters we're adopted!"

Jamie closed her eyes. Marissa and her mothers were fighting a lot lately. Part because Marissa thought she was old enough to live on her own and wanted to make her own decisions and her mothers still thought she was't ready for that. But by telling that they were't sisters Marissa really crossed the line. She was right of course that they were all adopted but they lived so long together like a real family and every one of them felt like if the others were family and Brooke and Carrie wanted that they treat each other like family.
Brooke looked at her oldest daughter with anger in her eyes. Jamie who had looked at them over the back of the couch slowly slid down.

"You're not going any were today young lady."

"I'm twenty years old. You can't tell me what i can do and can't do!"

"I sure can!"

But Marissa ran out before Brooke could stop her. Brooke sighed and went back to work in the kitchen.

"We won't see her tonight." Brooke mumbled.

Jamie focused her attention to the T.V again. Jade walked in.

"Was that Marissa who walked out?" Jade asked.

"It was." Jamie answered without looking up from the T.V.

"You're still looking those stupid cartoons. those are for kids." Jade said while she looked at the cartoon her sister was watching.

"Well i and Zoey just like those cartoons. They're funny."

"Sure! Pfff." Jade said while she blew some of her hair out her eyes.

Jamie finished the bag of chips and threw the empty bag in the garbage bin. Jade walked over to her and rubbed her sisters belly.

"Oh i think i feel some fat here is starting to come."

"Come on i'm not fat. I'm skinny. Mom always said i need to gain some weight."

Jade looked back at her sister. Jamie was a real toothpick girl and was happy with it. Other girls did everything to become slim and were starving themselves while Jamie stayed the same size without even trying.

"She does't anything to stay slim. I wonder. If she would become fat would she try to lose it? Or would she still be happy with it like now?"

Jamie still looked T.V.

She ran out the front door. She was glad she decided to take warm clothes this morning. She used the bus to get too the town. She paid for the stuff and got back home. Jaime was watching T.V again and Zoey was sitting next too her sister watching T.V while doing her homework. Something Jaime could't do. Watching T.V while doing homework. She knew a lot of kids did it but she could't do it.

"I already lived on my own by then."

"That's what i mean. You could do what you want by then. She can't and that's hard for her. You need to understand that. Try too give her a bit more room."

Jade walked too her room and read again the info on the bags so nothing could go wrong. Make people gain faster and slows metabolism and increases the appetite. But to be sure she would start with Jamie and make her super fat and after that she could make her other sister fat. Funny that Jaime the youngest and skinniest soon would be the fattest of them all

One and a half hour later Brooke yelled: "Dinner time."
